page.title: 07AMENITIES AND SCHOOL
page.content: Tynemouth Fire Station built in 1959 has codename Juliette,covers 7 square miles with 4 appliances.64 men working 4 shifts receive approx.27 calls a week.Busiest night is Friday.Quickest fire-fire station chip pan caught fire. Longest fire attended-Highfield School fire. Tynemouth Ambulance Service one of 26 of the Northumbria service.Reorgnised 1974 area covered Whitley Bay-Tynemouth Wallsend,Backworth.Staff 24 men and women 24 hour cover 3 shift system with 9 vehicles travelling approx.100 miles a shift.Motto:"Save life sometimes, Relieve suffering often,Give comfort always." STAR OF THE SEA SCHOOL-opened 1968 built on old farmland to replace the old St.Edwards.Main reason for move, increase in children.Today(19 July 1985)240 on roll,drop from 360.
